ygData.subject: Optimizing for speed.
ygData.msgSnippet: Could someone tell me what options I would change in my settings to speed up crawling?  I want to minimize the amount time spent on slow or unresponsive URI s,

Could someone tell me what options I would change in my settings to
speed u=
p crawling?  I want to minimize the amount time spent on slow
or unresponsi=
ve URI's, and lower timeouts to 10 seconds or so, and
only retry a URI a fe=
w times.  When I change the settings myself to do
this, Heritrix seems to q=
uickly die and stop crawling.  

Also, my RPC deciderule project is dead.  =
If anyone cares for the
code, they can have it, but I couldn't get my proce=
ssing done fast
enough on the server side for an RPC decide rule to be wort=
hwhile (Toe
threads waiting over a minute for a DecideRule to return turned=
